native.query:
SELECT EXTRACT(epoch FROM (
SELECT 
    justify_interval(
      avg(
        "vcs_PullRequest"."mergedAt" - "vcs_PullRequest"."createdAt"
      )
    ) as cycle_time 
  FROM 
    "vcs_PullRequest" 
  JOIN "vcs_Repository" ON "vcs_PullRequest"."repository" = "vcs_Repository"."id"
  JOIN "vcs_Organization" ON "vcs_Repository"."organization" = "vcs_Organization"."id"
  WHERE "vcs_PullRequest"."mergedAt" IS NOT NULL AND <<mergedAt>> AND <<repositoryName>>
) / 3600 / 24)

SELECT EXTRACT(epoch FROM (
SELECT 
    justify_interval(
      avg(
        "cicd_Build"."endedAt" - "cicd_Build"."startedAt"
      )
    ) as build_time 
  FROM 
    "cicd_Build" 
  LEFT JOIN "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation" ON "cicd_Build"."id" = "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."build"
  LEFT JOIN "vcs_Commit" ON "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."commit" = "vcs_Commit"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "vcs_Repository" ON "vcs_Commit"."repository" = "vcs_Repository"."id"
  WHERE 
    "cicd_Build"."createdAt" IS NOT NULL AND <<createdAt>> AND <<repositoryName>>
) / 60)

SELECT avg("source"."count") AS "avg"
FROM (SELECT (CAST(date_trunc('week', CAST((CAST("cicd_Build"."createdAt" AS timestamp) + (INTERVAL '1 day')) AS timestamp)) AS timestamp) + (INTERVAL '-1 day')) AS "createdAt", count(*) AS "count" FROM "cicd_Build"
LEFT JOIN "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation" ON "cicd_Build"."id" = "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."build"
LEFT JOIN "vcs_Commit" ON "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."commit" = "vcs_Commit"."id"
LEFT JOIN "vcs_Repository" ON "vcs_Commit"."repository" = "vcs_Repository"."id"
WHERE <<repositoryName>> AND <<createdAt>>
GROUP BY (CAST(date_trunc('week', CAST((CAST("public"."cicd_Build"."createdAt" AS timestamp) + (INTERVAL '1 day')) AS timestamp)) AS timestamp) + (INTERVAL '-1 day'))
ORDER BY (CAST(date_trunc('week', CAST((CAST("public"."cicd_Build"."createdAt" AS timestamp) + (INTERVAL '1 day')) AS timestamp)) AS timestamp) + (INTERVAL '-1 day')) ASC) "source"

cards.name: Average Build Time by Pipeline by Week

native.query:
SELECT
  EXTRACT (epoch FROM (justify_interval(
    avg(
      "cicd_Build"."endedAt" - "cicd_Build"."startedAt"
    )
  ))) / 60 as build_time,
  "cicd_Build"."name",
  DATE_TRUNC ('week', "cicd_Build"."createdAt") as week
  FROM 
    "cicd_Build" 
  LEFT JOIN "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation" ON "cicd_Build"."id" = "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."build"
  LEFT JOIN "vcs_Commit" ON "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."commit" = "vcs_Commit"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "vcs_Repository" ON "vcs_Commit"."repository" = "vcs_Repository"."id"
  WHERE 
    "cicd_Build"."createdAt" IS NOT NULL AND <<createdAt>> AND <<repositoryName>>
  GROUP BY "cicd_Build"."name", week

SELECT 
    EXTRACT(epoch FROM (justify_interval(
      sum(
        "cicd_Build"."endedAt" - "cicd_Build"."startedAt"
      )
    )) / 60) as build_time, "vcs_Repository"."name", "cicd_Build"."name" as pipeline_name
  FROM 
    "cicd_Build" 
  LEFT JOIN "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation" ON "cicd_Build"."id" = "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."build"
  LEFT JOIN "vcs_Commit" ON "cicd_BuildCommitAssociation"."commit" = "vcs_Commit"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "vcs_Repository" ON "vcs_Commit"."repository" = "vcs_Repository"."id"
  WHERE 
    "cicd_Build"."createdAt" IS NOT NULL AND <<createdAt>> AND <<repositoryName>>
  GROUP BY "vcs_Repository"."name", "cicd_Build"."name"
